title: Castlewars cloak (Saradomin)

properties.name: description
properties.value:
A Castlewars cloak can be bought from Lanthus at the minigame Castle Wars for 10 Castle wars tickets.
The cloak represents the RuneScape god Saradomin and, when worn, appear the same as when worn during a Castle Wars game.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Saradomin team cape
Not to be confused with Saradomin cloak.

A Castlewars cloak can be bought from Lanthus at the minigame Castle Wars for 10 Castle wars tickets. The cloak represents the RuneScape god Saradomin and, when worn, appear the same as when worn during a Castle Wars game.

Castle Wars capes may look like god capes, but it is not the same and Bandits will not automatically attack if players wear it. In addition, it does not protect players from Saradomin followers in the God Wars Dungeon.

[[File:Castlewars cloak (Saradomin) detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''Castlewars cloak''' can be bought from [[Lanthus]] at the [[minigame]] [[Castle Wars]] for 10 [[Castle wars ticket]]s.
The cloak represents the ''[[RuneScape]]'' god [[Saradomin]] and, when worn, appear the same as when worn during a Castle Wars game.

Castle Wars capes may look like [[god capes]], but it is not the same and [[Bandit (Bandit Camp)|Bandits]] will not automatically attack if players wear it. In addition, it '''does not''' protect players from Saradomin followers in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
